title: Untitled [three women swimmers watching walking man]
marks:
Signature and Inscription

URC on back, in penci LRC, in black: [Richard Holzschuh]
description: two woman with very long hair, seen from back, swimming at LLC; other woman visible behind rock in LRQ; women watch a man wearing a dark cloak walking through a mountain landscape with grasses and trees
